em.strong: EKES is a K-5 Elementary School in East Kingston, NH, serving approximately 130 students.

div.p: If you have an sau16.org account, and would like to request information to be added , edited, or removed from this website, please fill out the Website Change Form.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: If you require assistance with accessing any of the information on this page, please contact the IT help desk at: helpdesk@sau16.org.

p.a: We are an Equal Opportunity Employer
